hero.name: Hanna Jineth Contreras Salinas
hero.title: Software and Data Engineer Student

about.title: About Me
about.text: Software and Data Engineering student with a strong passion for creating robust web applications and efficient data systems. My approach combines solid technical foundations with an eye for clean design and user experience. Constantly exploring new technologies and best practices to deliver high-quality solutions.

approach.title: Approach
approach.text: Continuous learning and building practical solutions

database.title: MySQL Database Management System
database.description: MySQL database system implementing CRUD stored procedures, user-defined functions, and audit triggers to track data changes.

java.title: Java Inventory Management System
java.description: Console-based inventory system developed in Java using object-oriented programming, arrays, and CRUD operations.

philosophy.title: My Philosophy
philosophy.text: I believe in gentle processes, in the power of simplicity, and that technology can also be poetry. Every line of code is an opportunity to create something meaningful and elegant.
